document_data.name: Fraszummdin
document_data.mainbody: '''Fraaszummdin''', also known by the alias '''Steederhome''', was a small kingdom of [[duergar]] found underground near the [[Firepeaks]] in the [[Hordelands]] in [[1375 DR]].{{Cite dragon/349/The Horde: Barbarians of the Endless Waste}}
document_data.Geography: This kingdom was located roughly {{SI|4|miles}} underneath the [[Sunrise Mountains]] of northern [[Thay]]. The closest community to them of any note was the Trun’zoyl’zl district of [[Undrek’Thoz]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Exiles from Fraaszummdin often found sanctuary in the nearby [[dwarven]] kingdom of [[Siremun]] because of their expertise in breeding [[rothé]].
